transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ya good morning Sachin mam, Shaban baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se mam.
Customer: Ji morning.
Executive: Mam aapka ek time call aaya tha to isi liye is vajah se call kar raha tha mam.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Nahi us din aapne kaha tha na wo call karne ke liye to maine call lagaya lekin kisi ne uthaya nahi wo.
Executive: Achcha mam aapne wo bylead use kiya tha mam ne?
Customer: Haan wohi bylead maine unko bhej diya tha message.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur phir aapne kaha tha call karne ke liye to call kiya tha maine.
Executive: Hmm. Buyer ko call kiya tha aapne mam?
Customer: Haan haan buyer ko hi call kiya tha. Okay okay. To phir kya response aaya tha unke end se?
Customer: Nahi wohi unhone phone hi nahi attend kiya.
Executive: Achcha phone nahi pick kiya. Mam dekhiye aisa hota hai na sometime buyer busy honge ya other activities mein honge to might be possibility hai ki is vajah se phone pick na kare. So aapne unhe whatsapp pe connect kiya tha mam?
Customer: Nahi whatsapp pe to nahi connect kiya. Achcha aapne matlab jab IndiaMART ka jo message hota hai na usme se to apne message bheja tha lekin whatsapp nahi kiya tha.
Executive: Dekhiye kya hota hai mam sometime na buyer jyada aapko bhi bataya mam aap bhi agar jyada call pe active nahi hai to whatsapp pe jyada active honge mam. Koi message aaya hoga to aap turant us message ka reply de payenge right? To aap koshish ye kijiyega mam jaise hi hum bylead use karte hai na, bylead use karne ke turant aap call kijiyega, call ke baad whatsapp pe bhi aap unse connect kar sakte hai.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Matlab wohi number save karu main?
Executive: Haan. Nahi nahi wo pata hai kya hota hai mam dekhiye ek baar IndiaMART open kijiye main aapko guide kar deta hu.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Ki whatsapp se kaise connect karna hai.
Customer: Ek second.

Customer: Wo side mein jo icon aata hai usi se karu?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji left side pe three lines pe click karenge na fourth option aayega dekhiye lead manager aa raha hai mam?
Customer: Lead manager khula nahi hai abhi.
Customer: Haan ji lead manager usme click karo.
Executive: Haan. Lead manager pe click kijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai? Click karne ke baad dekhiye ek buyer name hoga mam ye Partha Chakravarti. Show ho raha hai upar?
Customer: Vijay Rathore show ho raha hai sabse upar.
Executive: Achcha Vijay Rathore haan. Unke naam par aap haan ek baar unke naam par click kijiye mam click kiya aapne?
Customer: Vijay Rathore pe?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Haan.
Executive: Click karne ke baad dekhiye jahan aapne catalog link share kiya hoga na uske niche likha hoga whatsapp. Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji. Achcha. To jaise hi aap is par click karenge jaruri nahi hai mam ki har buyer ka aapko number save karna hai. To yahan par jaise aap click karenge, click karte ke sath hi ye buyer ka whatsapp number hota hai mam har buyer ke hota hai. To direct hamara catalog link bhi buyer ke paas pahunch jayega aur aap unse whatsapp se bhi connect kar sakte hai mam.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. To mam matlab thoda sa aapko whatsapp jaane ke liye kya karna hai usko?
Executive: Back aa jaiyega mam back aa jaiyega jaise normal back aata hai na phone se. Haan. Back aa jayenge to normally back aa jayenge. To ye na jaise kal humne lead use kara tha mam achcha matlab char panch lead use kara tha. To in sabhi buyer se connect hua ho paya mam?
Customer: Haan wo ek Kanhaiya Lal unse maine baat hui thi.
Executive: Kanhaiya Lal Yadav ye ye to Free Pro agriculture drone chahiye tha. Hmm. Khargone ka Khargone ki location thi.
Customer: Haan haan. Unse wo the ek Chhindwara wale se hua tha maine.
Executive: Achcha matlab ye dono se positive response mila tha mam aapko?
Customer: Haan wo interested to par wo matlab bol main baad mein connect karte ki nahi. Kya hota hai ki maine unse bola tha main finance bhi karwa dungi agar aapko wo jo Kanhaiya Lal hai wo interest dikha rahe the. Ki agar finance amount jyada hota hai to ye sab agriculture mein rehte to unke paas itna cash wo paise rehte nahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Finance kyuki mam dekhiye mam 6 lakh 7 lakh ka apna product hai. To har buyer mein aisa to nahi hoga ekdam cash mein hi le le to some finance vagera bhi. Nahi nahi main karwa dungi maine ye kaha tha main finance bhi karwa dungi. Achcha to ek baar bilkul bilkul aap ek baar na connect kijiyega mam se. Thik hai aur inhe koshish kijiyega mam ki aap is deal ko grab kar sake right? Aur jaise aap use kar rahe hai mam similarly isi tarike se use kijiye jitna aap active rahenge na mam samne se bhi ek opportunity badh jati hai call inquiries bhi aane lag jati hai. Aur jaise aapne laga ki aapne bataya na Kanhaiya Lal positive the to isme jaise ki conversation ke bihaf par mam niche ek option to ask for review. To aap ja ke ask for review mein na unse review bhi le sakte hai taki mam agar catalog mein aapki pata online business hai review rating achche hoga to definitely buyer ka hame aur samne se response karne lagenge.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai mam. Ask for kahan par hai?
Executive: Niche hi aap dekhenge laptop pe on hai na aap online hai aap. Achcha. Dekhiye ask for review niche hi likha hoga jaise apne by default message aate hai mam niche catalog mein aap dekhenge wahan par option aayega ask for review ka to us par aap click karenge buyer ke paas review rating pahunch jayega to aap unse bol bhi sakte hai aap review rating dijiye. Otherwise right side par upar view more. Available thank you for inquiry. Dekhiye right side par na upar upar view more likha hoga mam right side par upar view more.
Customer: Right isi pe?
Executive: Haan jahan buyer ka naam buyer ka naam hoga buyer ke naam ke likha hai view more. Haan view more likha hai niche. Us pe click karenge dekhiye likha hua hai ask for review.
Executive: Option aa raha hoga ask for review ka. Isme done making hai automatic hai. Ask for review. View more mila aapko mam view more option. Haan view more mil gaya hai. Haan dekhiye wahan likha hoga ask for review.
Customer: Reply hai call hai. Show more mein. Ask for review aa raha hoga mam ek option aata hai. Okay shayad ho sakta hai dusra click. View more ek upar hai ek niche hai kaun sa wala karna hai?
Customer: Ask more ye jo upar jo detail diya hai wo phone call hai aur uske baju wala wohi wala na view more mein. Ji mam?
Customer: Jo upar jo ek call karne ka ek wo icon hai uske baju mein view more likha wo click karna hai na. Haan ji haan ji haan ji wahan par hi option aayega dekhiye ask for review ka mam.
Customer: Ask for review to nahi dikh raha mere ko. Ek baar main meeting link bheju mam aap join kar lijiye main check kar leta hu.
Customer: Recently viewed aa raha hai response by aa raha hai. Ek minute ek minute.
Executive: Ek baar mail open kijiyega aap apna. Mail. Mail open kar lijiye. Shaban ke naam se aapke paas aaya hua hai apna na keshani2009@gmail.com par. Ek second kis naam se? Shaban ke naam se aaya hua hai dekhiye aapke paas. Shaban. Haan ji. Haan Shaban. Ho ja.
Executive: Haan jaise hi aap mail open karenge na usme likha hoga. Haan join with Google Meet. Join with Google Meet ask to join the join now ka option aayega us pe click kar dijiyega. Hmm. Thik hai? Hamesha yahin se connect kar lete hai mam thik hai call disconnect kar dete hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to connect with buyers on WhatsApp.

- Customer unable to find ask for review option.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to connect on WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to guide via Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to guide customer via Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp, catalog, review
